name: closing-dichloramine-decomposition-nitrogen-and-oxygen-mass-balances-relative-importance-o
notes:
Data is for manuscript entitled "Closing Dichloramine Decomposition Nitrogen and Oxygen Mass Balances: Relative Importance of End-Products from the Reactive Nitrogen Species Pathway". This dataset is not publicly accessible because: The data was not generated by EPA.  It can be accessed by contacting the corresponding author. It can be accessed through the following means: Contact the manuscript corresponding author: Julian L. Fairey at julianf@uark.edu. Format: N/A. 

This dataset is associated with the following publication:
Pham, H., D. Wahman, and J. Fairey. Closing Dichloramine Decomposition Nitrogen and Oxygen Mass Balances - Relative Importance of End-Products from the Reactive Nitrogen Species Pathway.   ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY. American Chemical Society, Washington, DC, USA, 58( ): 2048-2057, (2024).
